title: In honor of Spooky month, here's something Spooky
body:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/cFj_EmlRCf4/hqdefault.jpg

J E E P E R S

replies.body:
i got something even spookier  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=StE-f3PqSQ8

ahh sword of the divine, good times.

Malphite building this first item and ulting you with it.
Draven building it.
What did it do? I wasn't around for it
100% AS + 3 guaranteed crits upon using the active iirc. If Twitch still had this item available for use tho, just thinking about it is giving me a headache.
I thought it gave you max AS + 3 crits
Well technically you're not wrong in that assumption, with the base 45% AS it gave plus the 100% boost, in most cases it did give max AS.
Back when Rengar actually felt like an assassin...
you mean back when rengar was op as fk...

you mean back when malphite actually felt like an assassin

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hxhmskeCZJs
nothing feels like an assassin these days since 100 to 0ing is unhealthy for league   thus is why assassins always fall out of meta quickly
You sonna beech! Get that christmas music outa here! #Spookytime
ok what ima need you to do is just mute the music in the video.. and play spooks ontop of it
What the hell you were meant to save that for Christmas!
shh it is christmas! because its spooky and spooky is for Halloween ;D
